mapper.insert: insert into pcac_merchant_report_delete (delete_id, createtime, batch_no, cus_type, doc_type, doc_code, cus_code, result_status, result_code,report_id ) values (#{deleteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update pcac_merchant_report_delete set createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cus_type = #{cusType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_type = #{docType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_code = #{docCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cus_code = #{cusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result_status = #{resultStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result_code = #{resultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where delete_id = #{deleteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select delete_id, createtime, batch_no, cus_type, doc_type, doc_code, cus_code, result_status, result_code from pcac_merchant_report_delete where delete_id = #{deleteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
